title: Roberto Antuna
text:
Data Analyst & Scientist | Engineer   Mexico City, Mexico | Willing to Relocate
Hi, I‚Äôm Roberto Antuna. I am a Data Analyst with a strong background in Mathematics and Statistical Reasoning.
I specialize in extracting value from data using  SQL, applying modeling with  R and  Python, and transforming findings into actionable business intelligence using  Excel,  Tableau, and  Power BI.

title: About Me
text:
I am an Engineer turned Data Analyst. I believe that technical rigor without curiosity is just calculation, not insight.

The ‚ÄúPlot Twist‚Äù (My Background)
I didn‚Äôt start in a computer science lab; I started in the labs of ESIQIE - IPN, graduating as a Petroleum Chemical Engineer.
There, I forged a steel-trap mind for Mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra, Probability) and Process Optimization. My first lines of code weren‚Äôt in Python, but in Fortran and Matlab, solving thermodynamic equations.
This background gave me a unique perspective: I see data not just as numbers, but as a system to be optimized. I channeled this engineering mindset into Data Analytics to solve complex business problems. Currently, I am expanding my toolkit into Data Science, applying advanced statistical models to go beyond explaining what happened and start predicting what‚Äôs next.


My Superpower: The Researcher‚Äôs Mindset
I pride myself on being a lifelong learner. While my core strength is mathematical logic, my ‚Äúsuperpower‚Äù is my research capability.
I don‚Äôt just rely on what I already know; I possess the discipline to study, read, and master new tools on the fly. Whether it‚Äôs deep-diving into a new R library or understanding a complex business requirement, I have the grit to find the answer and the technical foundation to implement it correctly.


Continuous Learning & Certifications
To solidify my transition and keep my skills sharp, I have completed specialized training programs:

Data Science with R (by Duke University on Coursera)
Google Data Analytics (by Google on Coursera)



Beyond the Data
When I step away from the screen, I blend my analytical side with leadership and creativity:

üèÄ Leadership: As a former basketball team captain for ‚ÄúClub Deportivo Leones,‚Äù I learned that strategy is useless without team execution.
üé• Creative Tech: I actively experiment with photography, video, and AI Media Generation. Exploring these tools keeps me on the bleeding edge of how technology is transforming content creation.
üé¨ Cinema & Storytelling: I am a huge fan of music and streaming series. This isn‚Äôt just entertainment; it fuels my appreciation for narrative structure.



Let‚Äôs Connect
I am based in Mexico City and always open to discussing data strategy, optimization challenges, or just sharing a good series recommendation.
Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn or Email.
